ICSCA (International Conference on Software and Computaer Applications)

Conference year: 2020

Total years: 9

Disciplines: Software & Computer Applications

Attendance cost: $2000-4000

Registration fee: $300-$580

Carbon footprint: 450

Other carbon footprint: 90

Society name: Universiti Malaysia Pahang (UMP) and Universiti Malaysia Perlis (UniMAP)

Society members: Not Applicable

Attendees: 300

Venue: Langkawi, Malaysia

Frequency: Annual

Sponsors: No information available online

Virtual option: None

Program dissemination: Yes the meeting program was available online.

On-site maternity: None
